verses.verse: וַ֭יַּעַן <S%H6030><s%> Then answered בִּלְדַּ֥ד <S%H1085><s%> Bildad הַשֻּׁחִ֗י <S%H7747><s%> the Shuhite וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

הַמְשֵׁ֣ל <S%H4910><s%> Dominion וָפַ֣חַד <S%H6343><s%> and fear עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> Who עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> [are] with him he maketh שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace בִּמְרוֹמָֽיו׃ <S%H4791><s%> in his high places

הֲיֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> Is there מִ֭סְפָּר <S%H4557><s%> any number לִגְדוּדָ֑יו <S%H1416><s%> army וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מִ֝֗י <S%H4310><s%> any לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> arise אוֹרֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H216><s%> his light

וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How יִּצְדַּ֣ק <S%H6663><s%> be justified אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> How then can man עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> God וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How יִּ֝זְכֶּ֗ה <S%H2135><s%> he be clean יְל֣וּד <S%H3205><s%> [that is] born אִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> ess

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> If עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even יָ֭רֵחַ <S%H3394><s%> Behold even to the moon וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יַאֲהִ֑יל <S%H166><s%> and it shineth וְ֝כוֹכָבִ֗ים <S%H3556><s%> not yea the stars לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no זַכּ֥וּ <S%H2141><s%> are not pure בְעֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> in his sight

אַ֭ף <S%H637><s%> How כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> How much less man רִמָּ֑ה <S%H7415><s%> maggot וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> and the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man תּוֹלֵעָֽה׃ <S%H8438><s%> oppressor פ
